form.label: HOWTO MEM: Generate stats and charts with Splunk Search Processing Language (SPL)
form.description: This collection of request samples will help you generating your own reports, dashboards and alerts for Nmon Performance data using the native Search Processing Language

h2.a: Physical and virtual Memory Statistics (click here for more information)

div.h1: MEM monitor: Physical and virtual Memory statistics

div.i:
The Howto interface uses the SPL language to manipulate and generate statistics of memory utilization.
Most of the fields are extracted and calculated automatically at search time, for convenience the application uses some generic fields that will be applicable for any supported operating system, as described above.
All fields are provided in volume unit (Megabytes) and percentage unit.

lu.li: mem_used_effective / mem_used_effective_PCT: Total amount (MB / %) of physical RAM used (For Linux OS, consider buffers and cached out of used memory)
mem_free_effective / mem_free_effective_PCT: Total amount (MB / %) of physical RAM left unused by the system (For Linux OS, consider buffers and cached as potential free memory)
mem: Total amount of physical RAM available (CIM compatible)
mem_used: Total amount of physical RAM used (CIM compatible, For Linux OS this includes buffers and cached part of used memory)
mem_used_PCT: Total amount (%) of physical RAM used (For Linux OS this includes buffers and cached part of used memory)
mem_free: Total amount of physical RAM left unused by the system (CIM compatible, For Linux OS buffers and cached are considered in used memory)
mem_free_PCT: Total amount (%) of physical RAM left unused by the system (CIM compatible, For Linux OS buffers and cached are considered in used memory)
swap_used_effective / swap_used_effective_PCT: The total amount (MB / %) of swap used (for Linux,OS, consider swap cached out of swap used)
swap_free_effective / swap_free_effective_PCT: The total amount (MB / %) of swap free (for Linux OS, consider swap cached as potential free swap)
swap: The total amount (MB) of swap available (CIM compatible)
swap_free: The total amount (MB) of swap left unused (CIM compatible)
swap_free_PCT: The total amount (%) of swap left unused (CIM compatible)
swap_used: The total amount (MB) of swap used (CIM compatible)
swap_used_PCT: The total amount (MB) of swap used (CIM compatible)

panel.title: Optionally preset frameID and/or hostname and press Enter:
Time oriented and statistics oriented charts:

div.h2: Time Oriented Charts:
Average Percentage Real and Virtual Memory Usage over last 24 hours in a line chart by server names (auto span definition using custom macro)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS mem_used_effective_PCT, avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS swap_used_effective_PCT by hostname

div.h2: Average Real Memory Usage and Total Real Memory in MB over last 24 hours in a line chart by server names (auto span definition using custom macro)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(mem_used_effective) AS mem_used_effective, avg(mem) AS mem_total_MB by hostname

div.h2: Average Virtual Memory Usage and Total Virtual Memory in MB over last 24 hours in a line chart by server names (auto span definition using custom macro)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(swap_used_effective) AS swap_used_effective, avg(swap) AS swap by hostname

div.h2: Average Percentage usage of Real and Virtual Memory over last 30 days for Working hours Business days only (monday to friday, 08h to 19h) with auto span (custom macro span definition) in a line chart by server names
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") AND (local_time>="0800" AND local_time<="1900") | timechart `nmon_span` avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS mem_used_effective_PCT, avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS swap_used_effective_PCT by hostname

div.h2: Compare Average Real Memory usage of yesterday versus today in a line chart of a specific server (time reference of yesterday)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS mem_used_effective_PCT_yesterday | appendcols [ search eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ earliest="@d" latest="now" | timechart `nmon_span` avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS mem_used_effective_PCT_today | fields - _time ]

div.h2: Compare Average Virtual Memory usage of yesterday versus today in a line chart of a specific server (time reference of yesterday)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS swap_used_effective_PCT_yesterday | appendcols [ search eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ earliest="@d" latest="now" | timechart `nmon_span` avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS swap_used_effective_PCT_today | fields - _time ]

div.h2: Stats oriented Charts:
Gauge chart of average Real Memory Usage in Percentage over last 24 hours
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | stats avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS avg | eval avg=round(avg, 2)

div.h2: Gauge chart of average Virtual Memory Usage in Percentage over last 24 hours
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | stats avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS avg | eval avg=round(avg, 2)

div.h2: Column chart of TOP 10 average Real Memory Usage in Percentage over last 24 hours
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | stats avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS avg by hostname | sort - avg | head 10 | eval xlabel="" | chart useother=f limit=0 values(avg) AS "Avg Real Mem %" by xlabel,hostname | rename xlabel AS "TOP 10 Real Mem % usage"

div.h2: Column chart of TOP 10 average Virtual Memory Usage in Percentage over last 24 hours
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | stats avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS avg by hostname | sort - avg | head 10 | eval xlabel="" | chart useother=f limit=0 values(avg) AS "Avg Virtual Mem %" by xlabel,hostname | rename xlabel AS "TOP 10 Virtual Mem % usage"

div.h2: Min / Average / Max and Average sparkline Real Memory Usage in Percentage over last 24 hours ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | stats min(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Min % Real Mem", avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Avg % Real Mem", max(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Max % Real Mem", sparkline(avg(mem_used_effective_PCT)) As sparkline by frameID,hostname | eval "Avg % Real Mem"=round('Avg % Real Mem',2)

div.h2: Min / Average / Max and Average sparkline Virtual Memory Usage in Percentage over last 24 hours ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | stats min(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Min % Virtual Mem", avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Avg % Virtual Mem", max(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Max % Virtual Mem", sparkline(avg(swap_used_effective_PCT)) As sparkline by frameID,hostname | eval "Avg % Virtual Mem"=round('Avg % Virtual Mem',2)

div.h2: Average Real and Virtual Memory Usage in Percentage with sparkline over last 24 hours ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | stats avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS mem_used_effective_PCT, avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS swap_used_effective_PCT, sparkline(avg(mem_used_effective_PCT)) As spk_mem_used_effective_PCT, sparkline(avg(swap_used_effective_PCT)) As spk_swap_used_effective_PCT by frameID,hostname | eval mem_used_effective_PCT=round(mem_used_effective_PCT,2) | eval swap_used_effective_PCT=round(swap_used_effective_PCT,2)

div.h2: Min / Average / Max of Real Memory Usage in Percentage over last 30 days for Business days only (monday to friday, 24hrs / 24hrs) ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | search (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") | stats min(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Min % Real Mem", avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Avg % Real Mem", max(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Max % Real Mem" min(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Min % Virtual Mem", avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Avg % Virtual Mem", max(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Max % Virtual Mem" by frameID,hostname | eval "Avg % Real Mem"=round('Avg % Real Mem',2) | eval "Avg % Virtual Mem"=round('Avg % Virtual Mem',2) | sort frameID,hostname

div.h2: Min / Average / Max of Real Memory Usage in Percentage over last 30 days for Working hours Business days only (monday to friday, 08h to 19h) ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") AND (local_time>="0800" AND local_time<="1900") | stats min(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Min % Real Mem", avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Avg % Real Mem", max(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Max % Real Mem" min(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Min % Virtual Mem", avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Avg % Virtual Mem", max(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Max % Virtual Mem" by frameID,hostname | eval "Avg % Real Mem"=round('Avg % Real Mem',2) | eval "Avg % Virtual Mem"=round('Avg % Virtual Mem',2) | sort frameID,hostname

div.h2: Min / Average / Max of Real Memory Usage in Percentage over last 30 days for non Working hours Business days only (monday to friday, 19h to 08h) ordered and sorted by frame ID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (local_time>="1900" AND local_time<="2359") OR (local_time>="0000" AND local_time<="0800") AND (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") | stats min(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Min % Real Mem", avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Avg % Real Mem", max(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS "Max % Real Mem" min(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Min % Virtual Mem", avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Avg % Virtual Mem", max(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS "Max % Virtual Mem" by frameID,hostname | eval "Avg % Real Mem"=round('Avg % Real Mem',2) | eval "Avg % Virtual Mem"=round('Avg % Virtual Mem',2) | sort frameID,hostname

div.h2: Compare Average Real Memory Usage in Percentage of current month versus previous month ordered and sorted by hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ earliest="-1mon@mon" latest="@mon" | stats avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) As usage_period1 by hostname | append [ search eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ earliest="@mon" latest="now" | stats avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) As usage_period2 by hostname ] | stats values(*) AS * by hostname | `eval_compare`

div.h2: Compare Average Virtual Memory Usage in Percentage of current month versus previous month ordered and sorted by hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ earliest="-1mon@mon" latest="@mon" | stats avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) As usage_period1 by hostname | append [ search eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ earliest="@mon" latest="now" | stats avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) As usage_period2 by hostname ] | stats values(*) AS * by hostname | `eval_compare`

div.h2: Use transaction to find servers having an average Real Memory usage higher than 90% for a minimal contiguous period of 5 minutes
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | where mem_used_effective_PCT>90 | transaction hostname mem_used_effective_PCT maxpause=5m | where duration>300 | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration,mem_used_effective_PCT,mem_used_effective,mem_free_effective,mem | stats values(*) AS * by _time,hostname | eval "duration (hh:mm:ss)"=tostring(duration,"duration") | rename duration AS "duration (seconds)" | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration*,mem_used_effective_PCT,mem_used_effective,mem_free_effective,mem

div.h2: Use transaction to find servers having an average Virtual Memory usage higher than 90% for a minimal contiguous period of 5 minutes
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | where swap_used_effective_PCT>90 | transaction hostname swap_used_effective_PCT maxpause=5m | where duration>300 | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration,swap_used_effective_PCT,swap_used_effective,swap_free,swap | stats values(*) AS * by _time,hostname | eval "duration (hh:mm:ss)"=tostring(duration,"duration") | rename duration AS "duration (seconds)" | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration*,swap_used_effective_PCT,swap_used_effective,swap_free,swap

div.h2: Use transaction to find servers having an average Real Memory usage higher than 90% for a minimal contiguous period of 5 minutes, restricted to Open hours and Business days (monday to friday, 08h to 19h)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") AND (local_time>="0800" AND local_time<="1900") | where mem_used_effective_PCT>90 | transaction hostname mem_used_effective_PCT maxpause=5m | where duration>300 | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration,mem_used_effective_PCT,mem_used_effective,mem_free_effective,mem | stats values(*) AS * by _time,hostname | eval "duration (hh:mm:ss)"=tostring(duration,"duration") | rename duration AS "duration (seconds)" | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration*,mem_used_effective_PCT,mem_used_effective,mem_free_effective,mem

div.h2: Use transaction to find servers having an average Virtual Memory usage higher than 90% for a minimal contiguous period of 5 minutes, restricted to Open hours and Business days (monday to friday, 08h to 19h)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ | eval date_wday=lower(strftime('_time', "%A")) | eval local_time=strftime('_time', "%H%M") | search (date_wday!="sunday" date_wday!="saturday") AND (local_time>="0800" AND local_time<="1900") | where swap_used_effective_PCT>90 | transaction hostname swap_used_effective_PCT maxpause=5m | where duration>300 | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration,swap_used_effective_PCT,swap_used_effective,swap_free,swap | stats values(*) AS * by _time,hostname | eval "duration (hh:mm:ss)"=tostring(duration,"duration") | rename duration AS "duration (seconds)" | fields _time,frameID,hostname,duration*,swap_used_effective_PCT,swap_used_effective,swap_free,swap
